general information:
Marketing Information Your everyday business monitor just got a large-screen upgrade. Save money and be more productive with an essential business monitor that delivers solid performance, a massive 23-inch diagonal screen, and energy savings at a very attractive price point. Do more throughout the day and efficiently grow your business with a stylish monitor that has proven HP quality and reliability, a stable lifecycle, and HP accessory compatibility.
Business-class presentation features.
Enjoy plenty of room to multi-task across your documents and e-mail with a 23-inch diagonal screen. Get crisp, clear views of your content with 1920 x 1080 resolution, 5 ms response time, and 3 M:1 dynamic contrast ratio.
Quickly and easily connect to your media and devices with VGA and DVI inputs. Keep your workspace tidy with the internal power supply.
